definition: right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple

sentences.english: The right person is still gonna think the sun shines out of your ass.
sentences.chinese: 總之對路的人會覺得你放的屁都是香的。

sentences.english: What kinds of grace did Boas show to Ruth?
sentences.chinese: 波阿斯對路淂表現出那些恩典？

sentences.english: 'Right-way fire' can be seen burning across Wunambal Gaambera country.
sentences.chinese: 在這張圖片上可以看到“對路火”燒遍了甘姆布拉縣。
